gtl::Curve2

Represents a 2D curve as a collection of non-continuous 2D points. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename Type>
class gtl::Curve2< Type >

Represents a 2D curve as a collection of non-continuous 2D points.

Returns the point along the curve at position x along the x axis. Returns 0 on success, -1 on error.

template<typename Type>
void gtl::Curve2< Type >::setInterpol ( INTERPOL_TYPES  type  )  [inline]

Performs an interpolation of the specified type (see INTERPOL_TYPES) on the current points for this curve, for the specified resolution.
